Initial Undertakings

Name of acquirer: Arriva Passenger Services Limited
Description of merger: Completed acquisition of the remainder of the entire shareholding of Centrebus Holdings Limited by Arriva Passenger Services Limited
Date original undertakings accepted: 31/10/2013
Companies giving undertakings: Arriva plc, Arriva Yorkshire Limited and Arriva Midlands Limited
Nature of undertakings: Hold separate undertakings
SIC code: 60.2
Case reference: ME/6226/13
Details of undertakings: Download the full text of the undertakings (pdf 1.5 Mb)

Amendments/consents: Derogation letter (5 February 2014) (pdf 113kb)
